q: that helped the Knicks build an 88-79 lead with four minutes to play, a lead they never lost. Everyone expected the John Starks-versus-Michael Jordan battle to be a major factor in the series. Round 1 went to John Starks . I don't even remember when John Starks was in the CBA, and I don't remember when he first came into the league, said Michael Jordan , referring to the minor league Continental Basketball Association.`` But I know he's here now.'' intentions. Kent Conrad , 62, who's led efforts to get the U.S. budget under control, said on Tuesday that he will not run for a sixth term in the Senate in 2012. It is more important I spend my time and energy trying to solve these( budget) problems than to be distracted by a campaign for re-election, Kent Conrad said in a statement. Democrats now control the Senate 53-47. There are 51 Democrats and two independents-- Joe Lieberman and Bernie Sanders of Vermont, both of whom caucus with Democrats. Democratic Party

With href="http://www.guardian.co.uk/lifeandstyle/family" title="More from guardian.co.uk on Family"> family breakdown for many, the fundamental bedrock of civic life in Britain has been destroyed. It was some of the very people who thought themselves left wing- the pleasure-seeking, mind-altering drug takers and sexual pioneers of the 1960s who instigated the fragmentation of the working-class family and sold the poor the poisonous idea of liberation through chemical and sexual experimentation. If this terrifying diagnosis puts Hello! in the clear, it does not, immediately, suggest any measures whereby the working classes can be saved from themselves, other than by the revival of the conventional family featuring

responsibility in the company. Earlier all the major strategic decisions were taken by the three of them together. But that is set to change. In a self-authored blogpost Eric Schmidt details about the new roles, Larry Page will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry Page will be even better! Larry Page , in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt describes co-founder Sergey Brin as an`` innovator and entrepreneur to the core'' and rightly so, his role in new and strategic projects would be much needed. He would continue to sport the`` co-founder'' title

OPPOSITION Labor PARTY LEADER Ed Miliband Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him. We think he should have gone earlier. He has now done the right thing. I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment, about hanging on to him as long as he did. Tim Bale , PROFESSOR OF POLITICS, UNIVERSITY OF SUSSEX`` It's obviously damaging because Andy Coulson was a very effective media operator so he is losing someone who was incredibly useful to the David Cameron operation.

key given to Michael Vick . Richard Hunter showed the council a picture of his black pit bull Mel, used by Michael Vick as a bait dog to train fighting dogs before he was seized by authorities. On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said. Richard Hunter called Dwaine Caraway 's action an embarrassment to the city`` rouge decision to besmirch the reputation of the city.''
